summary: Victoria is the capital of British Columbia, Canada, located on Vancouver Island. With a population of over 390,000, it's one of Canada's most densely populated cities. Named after Queen Victoria, it's known for its historic buildings, like the Parliament Buildings and the Empress Hotel. Victoria is also famous for its beautiful gardens and is a popular tourist destination. It has a strong technology industry and is considered one of the top cities in the world for quality of life. The city is connected to the mainland and the United States by ferries and the Victoria Clipper passenger ferry.
title: Victoria, British Columbia
